title: Citi Czech Republic to Launch a TV Campaign in May
summary: Prague - Citibank is running a TV advertising Campaign on Czech Television beginning May 1, 2013. The campaign, organized in partnership with Publicis, will promote the Citi Life credit card. Two versions of television advertisements air in May before the evening and sports news and the popular shows Rub a líc and 168 hodin (News of the Week).
tag-1: Citi Czech Republic to Launch a TV Campaign in May
tag-2: Prague – Citibank is running a TV advertising Campaign on Czech Television beginning May 1, 2013. The campaign, organized in partnership with Publicis, will promote the Citi Life credit card. Two versions of television advertisements air in May before the evening and sports news and the popular shows Rub a líc and 168 hodin (News of the Week).
tag-3: "Citibank normally uses other forms of marketing for its products and services, such as advertisements placed on public transport vehicles," said Andrea Klímová, Marketing Communication Manager. She adds: "After a long time, this campaign brings Citibank in the Czech Republic back on TV, and we believe that it will contribute to increased visibility of both the Citi Life credit card as well as Citibank brand."
tag-4: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
